about_the_game:
Survive hordes of enemies in this roguelite action game by managing spells and finding what works best for you in different situations. Defeat monsters, collect their drops and return to your campsite to craft gear and unlock new spells to make following runs easier!

  • Levels
    Defeat the incoming enemies in different environments and survive long enough to face the final boss of the level, and collect the materials dropped by defeated enemies to craft new gear and unlock spells.


  • The Shop


    After each wave you have a Shop break where you can buy new spells, upgrade your gear and buy spells you already have to upgrade them. Choosing what to buy each break is key in preparing for the waves.


  • The Campsite
    The campsite is your base of operations, here you can check your materials, craft new gear and unlock new spells to help you in future runs.


  • Different Playstyles


    Crafting and equipping armor not only changes your look, but also activates skills that change your playstyle, collect materials in each run to craft your favorite gear and create your own loadout and look.
